abstract: The U.S. government approved the proposed combination of Comcast and NBC Universal on Tuesday, smoothing the way for the deal to close by the end of January.
snippet: The U.S. government approved the proposed combination of Comcast and NBC Universal on Tuesday, smoothing the way for the deal to close by the end of January.
lead_paragraph: 6:00 p.m. | Updated  The proposed combination of Comcast and NBC Universal was approved by the Federal Communications Commission and the Justice Department on Tuesday, smoothing the way for the deal to close by the end of January.

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Tim Arango
